## concat() function

Creates a pattern builder for the concat operator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function concat(...patterns: PatternInput[]): PatternBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

patterns


</td><td>

[PatternInput](./pattern-builder.patterninput.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

The patterns to create the concat operator from.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[PatternBuilder](./pattern-builder.patternbuilder.md)

The pattern builder.

## Example 1

only string

```ts
concat("a", "b", "c");
// => /abc/
```

## Example 2

pre-defined pattern with pattern

```ts
concat(alpha, digit);
// => /[a-zA-Z][\d]/
```

## Example 3

pre-defined pattern with string

```ts
concat(alpha, "0");
// => /[a-zA-Z]0/
```
